climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: WELL MADE: Sold as 2 panels, each measuring 52"W x 96"L (from top edge of installed rod to bottom). Dual rod pocket top designed curtains can be hung on rod or with curtain clips, creating different style easily.

LUXURY LOOK: The plush velvet curtains are silky-smooth, soft, drapery and very pleasant to touch. Offered in charming tones and hues they easily blend into any style setting to make your rooms look more sophisticated and elegant.

LIGHT DIMMING: Rich velvet curtains can block most sunlight and uv ray to create a dark and cozy environment to enjoy better TV viewing or sleeping. Also provide privacy. Perfect for living room, bedroom, dinning room, home theater, kids room...

ENERGY EFFICIENT: Thick heavy insulated curtains balance room temperature by insulating against summer heat and winter chill, protect your floors, furniture and artwork from the ravages of the sun and save energy cost.
EASY CARE: Machine wash or dry clean. Spot clean with mild soap and water, air dry. Steam iron on low heat from back when needed. If you have any requirements, please email your request to us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Super Soft Premium Velvet Made of super plush velvet material, soft, smooth, and skin friendly, creating luxurious and elegance. Quite a good choice for gifts, living room, office, bedroom, room dividers... Multiple Functions Rich and thick velvet can impede unwanted light and UV ray, darken the room while protecting privacy. They are thermal insulated and can regulate indoor temperature effectively.

How do I get the color samples and custom size curtains? Please send emails for details. We will response within 24 hours for any issues. Are the colors correct in the image? We have images and videos to show the colors. They are almost similar with the actual, but due to different display devices or lighting environment, they may appear chromatic aberration. Will these velvet curtains truly blackout? Since they don't have the back liner, the thick fabric can be room darkening and truly privacy. The darker colors can work better.

100% Blackout Linen Curtains Block out 100% sunlight and UV rays to protect privacy and creat a dark environment to enjoy better sleeping quality. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegance, Quality and Value!
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are absolutely stunning! I am extremely satisfied with everything about them. The velvet material is very soft, yet quite heavy. The color is rich, yet smooth and pleasant to the eye. The curtains are sewn well and should last many years. That's a good thing because these will never go out of style. Elegance, quality and value in one package! Buy these now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful quality, transformed room
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the ivory color curtains for a small bedroom and they have really made it feel lighter and so much prettier. I've only just put them up and it is night and the camera on my phone does not do the rich color they are justice. I am very happy with the quality, the material is luxurious feeling and a good weight and well sewn. They stop the small draft thatcomes from that window (100 yr old house) and make the room more comfy as well as prettier. The window glass is 31" wide and I am glad I got the 52" width, the 84" falls to just above the carpet which is perfect. I love the look of curtains draping onto the floor but did not get them longer as I was worried one of our cats might decide to nap on them or something bad! Delighted with these curtains and love the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious Elegance - StangH Rust Curtains Velvet are a Dream Come True!
reviews.reviewText: I recently adorned my living space with the StangH Rust Curtains Velvet, and I am absolutely smitten with the luxurious elegance they bring to my home. These curtains are nothing short of a dream, and I can't help but express how much I love them!Pros:Opulent Velvet Fabric: The velvet fabric used in these curtains is a game-changer. It exudes opulence and sophistication, creating a sense of coziness and warmth in my living room. The quality of the material is exceptional, and it drapes beautifully.Rich Rust Color: The rust color of these curtains is simply divine. It adds a rich and inviting tone to my space, complementing various decor styles. The color is vibrant without being overwhelming, striking the perfect balance for a cozy yet stylish atmosphere.Effective Light Blocking: StangH Rust Curtains Velvet do an excellent job of blocking out light. Whether it's the morning sun or streetlights at night, these curtains provide a serene and dimmed ambiance, allowing me to create the perfect atmosphere for relaxation.Easy to Hang and Maintain: The curtains are easy to hang, and the grommet design adds a touch of modernity. I appreciate how low-maintenance they are, requiring minimal effort to keep them looking pristine.Cons:I honestly cannot find any drawbacks with the StangH Rust Curtains Velvet. They have exceeded my expectations in terms of both style and functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these velvet curtains in olive green. They are so beautiful! The velvet combined with the ruffling at the top make these curtains look vintage and expensive. I love the way they look in my room. They are pretty thick and function well as blackout curtains. I'd say they block about 95% of the light, around the same as any other blackout curtains I've owned. The olive green has mustard/gold undertones, which looks perfect with my decor. Very happy with how these turned out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They're listed as blackout drapes but after opening them, I was sceptical. They're beautiful velvet drapes, weighty but too much. Just enough that they hang beautifully. And yes, they are definitely blackout drapes. We just had a cold spell where it was in the teens at night and the room that has these hung up was warmer. No drafts felt at all when these drapes were closed. I was not expecting that. They worked better than drapes I paid 3x as much for. I'm definitely getting another pair for my guest room. Easy to hang, not wrinkled at all, definitely blackout drapes and an excellent value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So lux but bottom is uneven
reviews.reviewText: I love these sooo much they look expensive on a budget. They are true to color and nice and thick. The only problem I have is that the bottom is not even at ALL, I will have to lower the curtain rod to make them puddle on the floor so you won’t be able to tell, but that’s just annoying lol. Other than that they are so worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Might have to redo every room now....
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these for my living room and am so in love with the dark green version, I'm considering another set for a different room I had no intention of adding curtains to. They're so beautiful and well exceed the quality I expected of the price...I just might have to redecorate more rooms with more of these curtains. Buy at your own risk. I'll be back 😂*The dark green blocks light very well. It does cast a reddish glow when the sunlight is direct, so It's not truly blackout in my opinion, BUT it's pretty darn close. I don't think a lighter color would be as effective for blocking light though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Deep, rich color and very soft.
reviews.reviewText: These are great! a beautiful color green and feel like they're great quality. I love the velvet.If the sun is behind the window, you can see an orange glow behind them, which I really like, but might bother someone if they wanted 100% blackout
They are exactly as described. I really like them. And the quality is very good!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn't end up needing them in the end so didn't see them hung, but they seemed like great quality curtains. Colour and expected and felt good quality.

These curtains are amazing quality. The fabric has a nice weight to it and is quite dense. It lies beautifully on the floor nicely. I am very impressed. I ordered two colours: the ivory and camel beige. Both are gorgeous.
Really nice weight, they look great!
I love the red colour and feel of these curtains . Keeps the warmth in the house . Great price as I have them just for the winter .
